description: Create and publish one-pagers and boards for your organization. Upload images from the web, update content, and manage links before going live. Check slug availability and share instantly.

capabilities.name: create_onepager
capabilities.description: Creates a new OnePager in your organization. After creation, call update_onepager to populate fields, then publish_onepager. Example: {"onepager_name":"Acme","onepager_type":"fundraising"}

capabilities.name: create_board
capabilities.description: Creates a Board (curated list). location and description are required at creation.

capabilities.name: upload_image_from_url
capabilities.description: Fetch an image and upload via signed S3 URL. Use returned key in update_onepager (image_key, founders[].image_key, investors[].image_key).

capabilities.name: update_onepager
capabilities.description: Update any OnePager fields. Typical flow: set short_description, links.web_url, founders[], image_key, category_uuids; then publish_onepager. Use list_categories to map category names to UUIDs.

capabilities.name: update_board
capabilities.description: Update board properties, curators, and tags. Wraps backend shape { update: { board, curators, tags } }.

capabilities.name: publish_board
capabilities.description: Publish a board. If first publish, slug is required and must be unique; otherwise slug cannot change.

capabilities.name: check_board_slug
capabilities.description: Checks if a board slug is available (based on 404 for GET /boards/p/{slug}/valid).

capabilities.name: publish_onepager
capabilities.description: Publishes a OnePager. Optionally set slug and view_setting (anyone_with_link | access_list_only | anyone_anonymous). Use check_onepager_slug to validate custom slugs.

capabilities.name: check_onepager_slug
capabilities.description: Checks if a slug is available for publishing.

capabilities.name: list_categories
capabilities.description: Lists categories (uuid, name) to map tags to internal categories. Use uuids in update_onepager.category_uuids.

capabilities.name: health
capabilities.description: Returns ok: true to verify tool detection

capabilities.name: create_organization
capabilities.description: Creates a new organization and adds the current user as admin.

capabilities.name: invite_user_to_organization
capabilities.description: Adds an existing user or invites a new one to the organization, and grants access to existing OnePagers/Boards.

capabilities.name: update_organization_user
capabilities.description: Updates user role or nickname in the organization.
